    px-forms-design

    variables

    inuit-forms-namespace

    $inuit-forms-namespace: $inuit-namespace !default;

    Type

    String [default] - prepend value for all generated classes

    inuit-forms-color

    $inuit-forms-color: $black !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - font color

    inuit-forms-color--placeholder

    $inuit-forms-color--placeholder: $gray5 !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - placeholder font color

    inuit-forms-background

    $inuit-forms-background: $gray2 !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - background color

    inuit-forms-border--inner

    $inuit-forms-border--inner: inset 0 0 0 1px $gray3 !default;

    Type

    Color or String [default] - inner border string

    inuit-forms-border--outer

    $inuit-forms-border--outer: 1px solid $gray5 !default;

    Type

    Color or String [default] - outer border string

    inuit-forms-border--inner--focused

    $inuit-forms-border--inner--focused: inset 0 0 0 1px $gray4 !default;

    Type

    Color or String [default] - focused inner border string

    inuit-forms-border--outer--focused

    $inuit-forms-border--outer--focused: $select-blue-default !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - focused outer border color

    inuit-forms-color--disabled

    $inuit-forms-color--disabled: $gray5 !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - disabled font color

    inuit-forms-background--disabled

    $inuit-forms-background--disabled: $gray1 !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - disabled background color

    inuit-forms-border--disabled

    $inuit-forms-border--disabled: 1px solid $gray3 !default;

    Type

    Color or String [default] - disabled border string

    inuit-forms-color--readonly

    $inuit-forms-color--readonly: $gray5 !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - readonly font color

    inuit-forms-background--readonly

    $inuit-forms-background--readonly: $white !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - readonly background color

    inuit-forms-border--readonly

    $inuit-forms-border--readonly: 1px solid $gray3 !default;

    Type

    Color or String [default] - readonly border string

    inuit-forms-color--help

    $inuit-forms-color--help: $gray7 !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - help font color

    inuit-forms-select-background

    $inuit-forms-select-background: $gray3 !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - select dropdown background color

    inuit-forms-select-color

    $inuit-forms-select-color: $gray9 !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - select dropdown font color

    inuit-forms-select-shadow--dark

    $inuit-forms-select-shadow--dark: 0 1px 0 rgba($black, .1) !default;

    Type

    Color or String [default] - select dropdown dark shadow

    inuit-forms-select-shadow--light

    $inuit-forms-select-shadow--light: 0 1px 0 rgba($black, .1) !default;

    Type

    Color or String [default] - select dropdown light shadow

    inuit-forms-select-color--disabled

    $inuit-forms-select-color--disabled: $gray4 !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - select dropdown disabled font color

    inuit-forms-select-background--disabled

    $inuit-forms-select-background--disabled: $white !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - select dropdown disabled background color

    inuit-forms-select-background--hover

    $inuit-forms-select-background--hover: $gray5 !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - select dropdown hover background color

    inuit-forms-select-border--hover

    $inuit-forms-select-border--hover: $gray6 !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - select dropdown hover border color

    inuit-forms-select-background--pressed

    $inuit-forms-select-background--pressed: $gray6 !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - select dropdown pressed background color

    inuit-forms-select-border--pressed

    $inuit-forms-select-border--pressed: $gray7 !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - select dropdown pressed border color

    inuit-forms-select-multiple-background

    $inuit-forms-select-multiple-background: $gray1 !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - multiple select background color

    inuit-forms-validation-warning

    $inuit-forms-validation-warning: $alert-orange !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - validation warning color

    inuit-forms-validation-error

    $inuit-forms-validation-error: $alert-red !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - validation error color

    inuit-forms-validation-success

    $inuit-forms-validation-success: $green !default;

    Type

    Color [default] - validation success color

    inuit-enable-inline-fields

    $inuit-enable-inline-fields: false !default;

    Type

    Boolean [default] - produce css for one line form fields?

    inuit-enable-text-input--bare

    $inuit-enable-text-input--bare: false !default;

    Type

    Boolean [default] - produce css for bare text-inputs?

    inuit-enable-validation-states

    $inuit-enable-validation-states: false !default;

    Type

    Boolean [default] - produce css for field validation?

    inuit-enable-input--tiny

    $inuit-enable-input--tiny: false !default;

    Type

    Boolean [default] - produce css for tiny inputs?

    inuit-enable-input--small

    $inuit-enable-input--small: false !default;

    Type

    Boolean [default] - produce css for small inputs?

    inuit-enable-input--regular

    $inuit-enable-input--regular: false !default;

    Type

    Boolean [default] - produce css for regular inputs?

    inuit-enable-input--large

    $inuit-enable-input--large: false !default;

    Type

    Boolean [default] - produce css for large inputs?

    inuit-enable-input--huge

    $inuit-enable-input--huge: false !default;

    Type

    Boolean [default] - produce css for huge inputs?
